findings.title: Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract does not allow non-excluded addresses to transfer tokens.

findings.title: Time Units Usage
findings.description: The contract is using arbitrary numbers to form time-related values, decreasing code readability and preventing compiler optimization.

findings.title: Redundant Struct Declaration
findings.description: The `userData` struct is redundant as it only contains one property.

findings.title: Redundant Event Declaration
findings.description: Events are declared but not used in the contract, making them redundant.

findings.title: Unimplemented Function
findings.description: A function is declared but has no actual code, preventing the contract from operating as intended.

findings.title: Redundant Storage Writes
findings.description: The contract performs redundant storage writes without checking current values.

findings.title: Missing Check
findings.description: Variables are processed without proper sanitization and checks, potentially producing vulnerability issues.

findings.title: Redundant Variable Declaration
findings.description: Variables are declared but not used, making them redundant.

findings.title: Unused Fee Mechanism
findings.description: A fee mechanism is declared but not used by the transaction flow.

findings.title: Redundant Swap Functionality
findings.description: A swap functionality is implemented but never triggered due to the contract's balance always being zero.

findings.title: Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables are initialized only in the constructor and not defined as immutable.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming convention guidelines.

findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code is present in the contract, making it difficult to understand and maintain.

findings.title: Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are configured without proper checks for zero values.

findings.title: Multiple Pragma Directives
findings.description: Multiple conflicting pragma directives are included in the contract.

findings.title: Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The pragma version is not locked, potentially leading to unexpected version mismatches.
